title: Best of The Program | Guests: Bill O’Reilly & Larry Elder | 9/3/21
description:
Lt. Col. Scott Mann joins to talk about the emotional turmoil veterans are facing in the wake of Afghanistan and the importance of storytelling. Bill O’Reilly joins to discuss the news of the week, including Afghanistan, President Biden’s losing approval, and Texas’ heartbeat bill. California gubernatorial candidate Larry Elder joins to talk about his campaign and the odds he’s facing as a conservative in California. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
